Clue.Message: Welcome to the Xamarin Evolve Quest! Start your journey by talking with a Game Master to scan your first beacons!
Building and controlling robots in C# has never been so much fun with Xamarin.Robotics.
You’ll go bananas for a room inspired by the official Xamarin monkey. It rhymes with Xamarin and can be found at the end of the one on one hallways on floor 2.

Question.Text: What was the name of Nat and Miguel’s former company?

Clue.Message: Eat and be merry at Evolve

Question.Text: Name the cafe that served as Xamarin’s home base on Newbury street in Boston.

Clue.Message: Come find Brent, Devin, or Tony at the Twilio booth to experience some awesome VoIP.

Quests.CodeHint: See Twilio in action to get your secret code, text (678) 264-6842 with the word 'twilio'. If international number, just ask anyone at Twilio.

Clue.Message: Cubism is no mystery for this robot. He is solving cubes in the Darwin lounge.
Step into a dimension not only of sight and sound but of mind and cardboard. Found near the mini-hacks.

Quests.CodeHint: Try on cardboard to find all the hidden monkeys. Enter how many are hanging around.

Clue.Message: You + Me == Us:  Deep dive with a Xamarin experts on topics of your choosing. You are able to register right near by for one on ones.
Visit the Amazon booth to learn about cloud computing with Amazon Web Services.
Word up: you might excel at this next challenge, because we are all about developers, developers, developers.
We’re sweet on you! Crush some candy where this quest began, because this next beacon unlocks a tasty treat.
Outside registration X marks the spot. Watch out for the elusive Xamarins near by.

Question.Text: The first Evolve developer conference took place on what dates?

Prize.Message: Congratulations! Return to the quest start to claim your prize.
